title: President Rajapaksa arrives in Indonesia for 4th Bali Democracy Forum
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa and the Sri Lankan delegation arrived at Norarha International Airport in Indonesia for three days official visit this morning on 07 November.  The President was warmly received by the Sports Minister of Indonesia Mr.Andy Malarangan and Indonesian Children at the Airport….
